website_summaries.verdict: A versatile cleaner that is suitable for all types of inground pools and is compatible with variable-speed pool pumps.
pros: The X-Trax tires are designed to keep the unit moving with minimal hangups
The cleaner exhibits impressive performance when climbing walls and navigating tight corners
The adjustable intake allows the device to be as effective at picking up small debris as it is when sucking up leaves
cons: This unit requires a watchful eye and diligent maintenance in order to keep it running efficiently

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want to buy!
customer_reviews.text: After owing several pool vacs, I have found that the best one is the MX8. The ability to make the suction hole larger and scrubbing floor pads is a win-win!! The people that left 1 star reviews clearly did not know how to calibrate it and set the suction hole correctly. If you take your time and install it correctly it will work perfectly as shown in video. Also dont leave your vacuum in the pool 24/7 . make it a habit to take it and only use it when you need to clean the pool.
customer_reviews.author: R. Urias

customer_reviews.title: Decent cleaner with some reservations.
customer_reviews.text: This generally works very well. Has no issues scaling the sides of the pool and the separation between this robot and the collection canister (Zodiac Cyclonic Automatic Pool Cleaner Leaf Catcher Canister) is genius. Unlike the old style polaris that carried a small bag around, this works really well. My gripes about this is if you have palm fronds, you may find that the leaves sometimes gets tangled in the gears and the cleaner just stops running.
customer_reviews.author: AKCh

customer_reviews.title: Suction
customer_reviews.text: My pool as two skimmers and a dedicated port for a cleaner. With the standard Baracuda - G3 Advanced Suction Side Automatic Pool Cleaner application this worked fine. However this unit requires 1/2 of the available suction provided by the pump instead of the 1/3 the other unit operated on. I have to disable one of the skimmers in order to effectively operate the unit. I do like the unit and it does all the way up to the water line but I hate losing one skimmer.
customer_reviews.author: CARL

customer_reviews.title: A great pool cleaner with a lot of suction
customer_reviews.text: It's been in the pool for 2 days and it's working quite well. It does go up the sides as well. The only thing is that we have a leaf catcher that was attached to our previous cleaner and it had to be made to attach to this one. It's working fine. Zodiac does have a leaf catcher that can be purchased. Also, because of the amount of suction needed, the outflow water deflectors come off in the zodiac and have to be taken out. It really cleans the pool!

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU AMAZON!
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these for a few years and rebuilt as necessary. Finally got tired of rebuilding old one and replaced with new one which only worked for a few months. I understand ZODIACS position but the suppliers they recommend want nothing to do with you if you did not purchase the product through them. customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have had the Zodiac for only about a month, but it already puts the Polaris I had previously to shame. The Zodiac hose connects with interlocking pieces. The cleaner has a wider path than most. It does not get stuck in corners, and it climbs the walls of the pool. If the Zodiac continues to perform like this, it is hands down the best for the low price.

product_meta.title: Zodiac MX8 Suction-Side Cleaner
product_meta.description:
Ultra-efficient low-flow pool cleaning robot
(view larger). The Zodiac MX8 is ready to battle your pool's toughest dirt and debris. The dual cyclonic suction enables the MX8 to move faster and deliver unsurpassed vacuum power, while requiring 30 percent less flow. Its ultra efficient design requires less flow than any cleaner in its class for maximum energy savings. Best choice for solar, 2-speed, and variable-speed pumps.

It has a wider cleaning path than competitor models, with a large vacuum inlet to capture larger debris. maX-drive technology promotes maximum torque and extreme maneuverability, allowing the MX8 to aggressively clean your pool walls and floors. Its twist locking hose enables quick, secure attachment to the cleaner head and the cleaner includes 39 feet of hose.

DUAL CYCLONIC SUCTION
Cleans better and faster than other pool cleaners with greater vacuum power, wider cleaning path, and largest debris inlet.

MAX-DRIVE NAVIGATION
Advanced dual navigation for best pool coverage with no hang-ups. Thoroughly cleans floor, walls, and waterline of any size or shape pool.

OPTIMIZED FLOW CONTROL
Automatically controls excess flow through cleaner for optimal performance and longevity.

MOST ENERGY EFFICIENT
Requires as little as 20 GPM of flow, making the MX8 the best choice for solar, two speed, and variable speed pumps.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
MX8 cleaner body, Flowkeeper valve, valve cuff, two twist-lock 45-degree elbows (one extended), flow regulator valve, leader hose section with hose float, 11 twist lock hose sections, operating instructions

MX8 PREMIUM SUCTION-SIDE IN-GROUND POOL CLEANER
AT A GLANCE
 * Double cyclonic suction creates a wider cleaning path and larger debris consumption
 * maX-Drive Navigation Advanced dual navigation for best pool coverage with no hang ups
 * Flex-Power turbine provides ultra-efficient operation on low-flow without compromising power
 * Sealed gearbox prevents debris from fouling components
 * Heavier-weight construction increases durability and robustness
 * For use on all pool surfaces
 * Includes 36 feet of feed hose
